TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqIntegrationSecurity extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The MsmqIntegrationSecurity class encapsulates the transport security settings for the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Message Queuing integration channel enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications to communicate with existing Message Queuing applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the that is associated with the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
Docs.value: The that is associated with the Message Queuing integration channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode> is an enumeration that contains the following values: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>. The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>.

Docs.summary: Gets the that is associated with the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
Docs.value: The that is associated with the Message Queuing integration channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity> encapsulates the security settings for the Message Queuing integration transport. The settings are the same for both the Message Queuing integration and queued transports. <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity> enables you to set the Authentication Mode, Encryption Algorithm, Secure Hash Algorithm, and Protection Level.
